name: Pacific Premier Bancorp, Inc.
description: Pacific Premier Bancorp, Inc. is a full-service commercial bank based in the western United States, providing a wide range of financial services to businesses and individuals. Founded in 1983, the company operates through its banking subsidiary, Pacific Premier Bank, which offers commercial banking, real estate lending, and a variety of deposit products. With a focus on relationship banking, Pacific Premier serves a diverse clientele, including small to mid-sized businesses, real estate investors, and professionals. The bank is committed to delivering personalized service and tailored financial solutions to meet the unique needs of its customers. Over the years, Pacific Premier has expanded both organically and through strategic acquisitions, enhancing its geographic footprint and product offerings. The company's approach to lending emphasizes prudent underwriting practices and risk management, which has contributed to its strong financial performance. In addition to traditional banking services, Pacific Premier provides wealth management and treasury management services, ensuring that it can address the comprehensive financial needs of its clients. With a mission to empower its communities and clients to achieve financial success, Pacific Premier Bancorp remains dedicated to fostering long-term relationships built on trust and integrity.
